did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physdesc: This collection contains three items: annual membership receipts, a list of appraised properties, and an article of agreement.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: McPheeters, Harper and Swartzle Collection, Collection #4021, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Green Valley Auction Sept., 2000

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The annual membership receipts for the Virginia Central Agricultural Society for A. A. McPheeters and Miss Mary J. McPheeters are dated 1859; a list of the appraised property of Mrs. M. R. Harper, deceased, Augusta County, are dated April 15, 1875; and an article of agreement between Ira Swartzle, David Swartzle, and J. William Sheetz, concerning raising wheat and rye, Augusta County, is dated 1849.
